animeTitle: Hayate no Gotoku! Movie: Heaven is a Place on Earth
otherNames: Hayate the Combat Butler! Movie, 劇場版 ハヤテのごとく! HEAVEN IS A PLACE ON EARTH
synopsis: At the end of the summer vacation, Hayate, Nagi, and company take a trip to the countryside; a place with no games, no anime, and no mobile signal.
